UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_V2_C.Enable: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. If set to CREATE ONLY, will only be enabled while editing your Island.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_V2_C.Visibl: Determines whether the device is visible during the game. This does affect its collision properties.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_V2_C.PlayAc: Determines whether the device plays VFX and SFX when stepped on.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_V2_C.ResetI: Determines whether the player's inventory is reset when they activate the checkpoint.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_V2_C.Allowe: Determines which Class can activate the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_V2_C.Activa: Determines which Team can activate the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_C.Disable.D: Disables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_V2_C.On Fir: Each time a new player activates the checkpoint for the first time.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_C.Enable.De: Enables the device on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
Register this checkpoint to the activating player on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_V2_C.Regist: Register this checkpoint to the activating player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_V2_C.On Fir: The first time the checkpoint is activated by any player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Prop_PlayerCheckpoint_C.On First: Transmits a signal on the selected channel each time a new player activates the checkpoint for the first time.
Transmits a signal on the selected channel the first time the checkpoint is activated by any player.
